text:
Using a 45 45 90 triangle evaluate trig functions

\begin{array}{l}\n\cot \left(45^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\cos \left(45^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\csc \left(45^{\circ}\right)=\n\end{array}[imath]\cot \left(45^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\cos \left(45^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\csc \left(45^{\circ}\right)=[/imath]
